question: was patient 12724975 diagnosed with hypoxemia until 1 year ago and did a chest x-ray reveal any tubes/lines in the abdomen during the same period?
template: has patient 12724975 been diagnosed with hypoxemia until 1 year ago and also had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines in the abdomen within the same period?
query: select ( select count(*)>0 from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'hypoxemia' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12724975 ) and datetime(diagnoses_icd.charttime) <= datetime(current_time,'-1 year') ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12724975 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= datetime(current_time,'-1 year') ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray reveal any tubes/lines in the abdomen?", t1.study_id) = true )

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 16905933 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime,'start of year') = datetime(current_time,'start of year','-0 year') and strftime('%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) = '12' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate any tubes/lines in the right chest wall?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'prochlorperazine' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 16905933 ) and datetime(prescriptions.starttime,'start of year') = datetime(current_time,'start of year','-0 year') and strftime('%m',prescriptions.starttime) = '12' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.starttime and ( datetime(t3.starttime) between datetime(t1.studydatetime) and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.studydatetime) between datetime(t3.starttime) and datetime(t3.starttime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} in the ${object} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines in the right chest wall [time_filter_global1:mix-month-this_year] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'coronary atherosclerosis of native coronary artery' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 10037020 ) and strftime('%y',diagnoses_icd.charttime) <= '2104' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 10037020 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2104' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("is subcutaneous air indicated on an x-ray?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.charttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')

value.diagnosis_name: coronary atherosclerosis of native coronary artery

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'colonoscopy' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 19936204 ) and strftime('%y',procedures_icd.charttime) >= '2104' ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 19936204 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2104' ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray demonstrate any technical assessments in the spine?", t1.study_id) = true )

question: after patient 13122104 was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney diseases since 09/2104, did they have a chest x-ray revealing any tubes/lines within 2 day?
template: has patient 13122104 had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines within 2 day after having been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney disease since 09/2104?
query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'type 2 diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney disease' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 13122104 ) and strftime('%y-%m',diagnoses_icd.charttime) >= '2104-09' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 13122104 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2104-09' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray reveal any tubes/lines?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.charttime) and datetime(t1.charttime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.charttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 day') )

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'other endoscopy of small intestine' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 15649581 ) and strftime('%y-%m',procedures_icd.charttime) >= '2105-10' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 15649581 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2105-10' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("has an x-ray revealed any diseases in the trachea?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.charttime) and datetime(t1.charttime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.charttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} in the ${object} [time_filter_within] after having received {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any disease in the trachea [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having received {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_global1:abs-month-since] ?

q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} [time_filter_within] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines [time_filter_within:within-month] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-year-in] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = '0.9% sodium chloride' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18476657 ) and strftime('%y',prescriptions.starttime) = '2104' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18476657 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) = '2104' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray show any tubes/lines?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.starttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.starttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} [time_filter_within] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines [time_filter_within:within-month] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-year-in] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12822417 ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray show any tubes/lines in the upper mediastinum?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'encounter for therapeutic drug monitoring' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12822417 ) ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.charttime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} in the ${object} [time_filter_global1] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime, tb_cxr.hadm_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 13880645 ) and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= datetime(current_time,'-4 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate pleural/parenchymal scarring in the right costophrenic angle?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select procedures_icd.charttime, procedures_icd.hadm_id from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'insertion of one vascular stent' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 13880645 ) and datetime(procedures_icd.charttime) >= datetime(current_time,'-4 year') ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and t1.hadm_id = t3.hadm_id

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'complications of stem cell transplant' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 15526304 ) and datetime(diagnoses_icd.charttime) <= datetime(current_time,'-6 month') ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 15526304 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= datetime(current_time,'-6 month') ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray display any abnormality in the right chest wall?", t1.study_id) = true )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1] and also had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality in the ${object} within the same period?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1:rel-month-until] and also had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality in the right chest wall within the same period?

question: after the prescription of ascorbic acid on the last hospital visit, did the chest x-ray for patient 12360014 indicate any diseases in the left costophrenic angle within 2 day?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'acquired absence of other left toe(s)' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18448597 ) ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18448597 ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does the chest x-ray indicate vascular redistribution?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.charttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')

value.diagnosis_name: acquired absence of other left toe(s)

q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} in the ${object} [time_filter_within] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating breast/nipple shadows in the left lung [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:null] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'open reduction of fracture with internal fixation, femur' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 16191519 ) and datetime(procedures_icd.charttime) >= datetime(current_time,'-3 year') ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 16191519 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= datetime(current_time,'-3 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate any abnormality in the left costophrenic angle?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.charttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')

value.procedure_name: open reduction of fracture with internal fixation, femur

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'diverticulum of bladder' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18174697 ) and strftime('%y',diagnoses_icd.charttime) <= '2104' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18174697 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2104' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("is any abnormality indicated in the right lower lung zone on an x-ray?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.charttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality in the ${object} [time_filter_within] after having been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1]?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'insertion of intercostal catheter for drainage' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18969313 ) and datetime(procedures_icd.charttime) <= datetime(current_time,'-3 year') ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18969313 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= datetime(current_time,'-3 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("is the chest x-ray revealing any abnormality in the svc?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.charttime) and datetime(t1.charttime,'+2 month') ) or ( datetime(t1.charttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 month') )

value.procedure_name: insertion of intercostal catheter for drainage

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12822417 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2105' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("has a chest x-ray shown alveolar hemorrhage?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'tramadol' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12822417 ) and strftime('%y',prescriptions.starttime) >= '2105' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.starttime and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.starttime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within:within-month] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating alveolar hemorrhage [time_filter_global1:abs-year-since] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'hyperlipidemia, unspecified' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 19795930 ) and strftime('%y',diagnoses_icd.charttime) >= '2105' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 19795930 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2105' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("is superior mediastinal mass/enlargement shown on a chest x-ray?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.charttime) and datetime(t1.charttime,'+2 month') ) or ( datetime(t1.charttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 month') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} [time_filter_within] after having been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1]?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating superior mediastinal mass/enlargement [time_filter_within:within-n_month] after having been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-year-since]?

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'alcohol withdrawal' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 14410216 ) and strftime('%y-%m',diagnoses_icd.charttime) >= '2105-10' ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 14410216 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2105-10' ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("is the chest x-ray showing any diseases in the right lung?", t1.study_id) = true )

question: after the prescription of d5ns until 2 year ago, did the chest x-ray for patient 12502386 indicate any fluid overload/heart failure in the left lower lung zone within the same month?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'd5ns' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12502386 ) and datetime(prescriptions.starttime) <= datetime(current_time,'-2 year') ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12502386 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= datetime(current_time,'-2 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does the chest x-ray indicate any fluid overload/heart failure in the left lower lung zone?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.starttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.starttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 10737408 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) = '2105' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate any abnormality?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'long-term (current) use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatories (nsaid)' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 10737408 ) and strftime('%y',diagnoses_icd.charttime) = '2105' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.charttime,'start of month')

tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_within:within-month] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality [time_filter_global1:abs-year-in] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'flexible sigmoidoscopy' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18306835 ) and strftime('%y-%m',procedures_icd.charttime) >= '2101-11' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18306835 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2101-11' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("is there any indication of any abnormality in the carina on a chest x-ray?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.charttime) and datetime(t1.charttime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.charttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality in the ${object} [time_filter_within] after having received {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality in the carina [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having received {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_global1:abs-month-since] ?

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from prescriptions where prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18061894 ) and strftime('%y',prescriptions.starttime) <= '2103' ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18061894 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2103' ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray show pneumonia in the left upper lung zone?", t1.study_id) = true )

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18728663 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= datetime(current_time,'-132 month') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate any abnormality?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'left heart cardiac catheterization' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18728663 ) and datetime(procedures_icd.charttime) >= datetime(current_time,'-132 month') ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and ( datetime(t3.charttime) between datetime(t1.studydatetime) and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.studydatetime) between datetime(t3.charttime) and datetime(t3.charttime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} received a {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} received a {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any abnormality [time_filter_global1:rel-month-since] ?

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'family history of malignant neoplasm of breast' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12904315 ) and strftime('%y-%m',diagnoses_icd.charttime) <= '2101-07' ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12904315 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2101-07' ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("is the chest x-ray depicting any abnormality?", t1.study_id) = true )

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'furosemide' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 18011403 ) and strftime('%y-%m',prescriptions.starttime) <= '2102-08' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 18011403 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2102-08' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray reveal any vascular calcification?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.starttime < t3.studydatetime and ( datetime(t3.studydatetime) between datetime(t1.starttime) and datetime(t1.starttime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.starttime) between datetime(t3.studydatetime) and datetime(t3.studydatetime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} [time_filter_within] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating vascular calcification [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-month-until] ?

query: select ( select count(*)>0 from prescriptions where prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 15189222 ) and prescriptions.drug = 'simvastatin' and strftime('%y-%m',prescriptions.starttime) = '2102-09' ) and ( select count(distinct t1.study_id) > 0 from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 15189222 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) = '2102-09' ) ) as t1 where func_vqa("is any anatomical findings shown on a chest x-ray?", t1.study_id) = true )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] and also had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} within the same period?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-month-in] and also had a chest x-ray study indicating any anatomicalfinding within the same period?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'heparin' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 11350319 ) and strftime('%y',prescriptions.starttime) <= '2104' ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 11350319 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) <= '2104' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray show any any tubes/lines in the left shoulder?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.starttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.starttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} in the ${object} [time_filter_within] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating any tubesandlines in the left shoulder [time_filter_within:within-month] after having been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_global1:abs-year-until] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'congestive heart failure, unspecified' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 14112540 ) and datetime(diagnoses_icd.charttime) >= datetime(current_time,'-1 year') ) as t1 join ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 14112540 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= datetime(current_time,'-1 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("has an x-ray indicated ij line?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t3 where t1.charttime < t3.studydatetime and datetime(t1.charttime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.studydatetime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} [time_filter_within] after having been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_global1]?

q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} [time_filter_within] after having received {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_global1] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 17112656 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) = '2102-11' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate low lung volumes in the left lower lung zone?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = 'aspirin' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 17112656 ) and strftime('%y-%m',prescriptions.starttime) = '2102-11' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.starttime and ( datetime(t3.starttime) between datetime(t1.studydatetime) and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.studydatetime) between datetime(t3.starttime) and datetime(t3.starttime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} in the ${object} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating low lung volumes in the left lower lung zone [time_filter_global1:abs-month-in] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 10283092 and datetime(tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= datetime(current_time,'-2 year') ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray reveal any devices?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select procedures_icd.charttime from procedures_icd where procedures_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_procedures.icd_code from d_icd_procedures where d_icd_procedures.long_title = 'open and other left hemicolectomy' ) and procedures_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 10283092 ) and datetime(procedures_icd.charttime) >= datetime(current_time,'-2 year') ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and ( datetime(t3.charttime) between datetime(t1.studydatetime) and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'+2 month') ) or ( datetime(t1.studydatetime) between datetime(t3.charttime) and datetime(t3.charttime,'+2 month') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} received a {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} received a {procedure_name} procedure [time_filter_within:within-n_month] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any device [time_filter_global1:rel-year-since] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 14537002 and strftime('%y-%m',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2103-11' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("has a chest x-ray revealed any diseases?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select prescriptions.starttime from prescriptions where prescriptions.drug = '1/2 ns' and prescriptions.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 14537002 ) and strftime('%y-%m',prescriptions.starttime) >= '2103-11' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.starttime and ( datetime(t3.starttime) between datetime(t1.studydatetime) and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'+2 day') ) or ( datetime(t1.studydatetime) between datetime(t3.starttime) and datetime(t3.starttime,'+2 day') )
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any ${category} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating any disease [time_filter_global1:abs-month-since] ?

query: select count(*)>0 from ( select tb_cxr.studydatetime from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct t2.study_id from ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.subject_id = 12648153 and strftime('%y',tb_cxr.studydatetime) >= '2103' ) ) as t2 where func_vqa("does a chest x-ray indicate shoulder osteoarthritis in the right shoulder?", t2.study_id) = true ) ) as t1 join ( select diagnoses_icd.charttime from diagnoses_icd where diagnoses_icd.icd_code = ( select d_icd_diagnoses.icd_code from d_icd_diagnoses where d_icd_diagnoses.long_title = 'esophageal reflux' ) and diagnoses_icd.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 12648153 ) and strftime('%y',diagnoses_icd.charttime) >= '2103' ) as t3 where t1.studydatetime < t3.charttime and datetime(t1.studydatetime,'start of month') = datetime(t3.charttime,'start of month')
q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_within] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating ${attribute} in the ${object} [time_filter_global1] ?
tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been diagnosed with {diagnosis_name} [time_filter_within:within-month] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating shoulder osteoarthritis in the right shoulder [time_filter_global1:abs-year-since] ?

tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed with {drug_name} [time_filter_within:within-n_day] after having had a chest x-ray study indicating intra-aortic balloon pump [time_filter_global1:abs-month-until] ?
